ucsc.edu.book.controller

Class BookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ucsc.edu.book.controller.BookController

  • public class BookController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a BookController which gets data from the dataSource and passes it to the view. It executes the actions on model as requested by the view.
    Author:
    pallavidas
